name: Divyansh Gawri

experience.title: Freelance Machine Learning Engineer
description: Collaborated with a skincare startup to build a personalized recommendation engine based on facial condition data.
Designed and trained machine learning models to identify condition-specific needs and suggest optimal product compositions.
Delivered a deployable ML pipeline and actionable insights for integration into the client’s product strategy.

projects.title: Face Recognition System
description: Built a facial recognition application using OpenCV and TensorFlow to detect and match individual faces with confidence scoring.

projects.title: Skincare Recommendation System
description: Created a machine learning-based engine to analyze facial condition data and provide personalized skincare product suggestions.

projects.title: E-commerce Product Description Classifier
description: Developed an NLP-based model to automatically predict product categories and subcategories from customer descriptions.

certificates: Databases and SQL for Data Analysis – IBM (Coursera)
